ValidationRule.description: This will validate if all necessary field/s was populated appropriately prior to saving contact record.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Contact_Type__c, 'StarTrack Service'), CASE( TEXT(Pref_Method_of_Contact__c), 'Email', IF(ISBLANK(Email), 1, 0), 'Mobile', IF(ISBLANK(MobilePhone), 1, 0), 'Phone', IF(ISBLANK(Phone), 1, 0), 0) == 1)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Email, Mobile or Phone value is required when either "Email", "Mobile" or "Phone" is selected as Preferred Method of Contact.
